title: [K-12] Strategies for Developing Critical Thinking Through Online Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic online learning tools, intermediate-level understanding of fundamental scientific concepts
context.additional_context: Structured online course design operated in a smartphone-centric constrained technological environment

learning_goals: Learners can develop educational materials by applying online course design principles based on Quality Matters (QM) standards.
Learners can improve critical thinking skills by 20% or more using online discussion forums and peer assessment systems.
Learners can propose solutions to address technological accessibility gaps by designing mobile-optimized learning activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
